title: Is it worth placing static client on low priority with task manager while in game?
body: I don't like the time it takes to re-open static client after match ends when I have "close client during game" enabled, so I'm just curious if there are other viable options like I mentioned.

replies.body: I'm not entirely sure what that could end up doing to the game itself, but you're welcome to experiment with that option! I'd **highly** recommend testing those changes in a custom or practice match first, since we don't want to hurt other players live games in the case that something goes a little screwy.
